page.title: 12Creasey's Farm
page.content: An {arable farm}of 504 acres,484 of which are cultivated. It is run by the farmer alone for most of the year, with one or two extra workers at harvest. Crops 300 acres {winter wheat,} 100 acres {peas}the rest {winter {barley. The barn holds 1200 tons of { {wheat}which can be blown dry from the wind tunnel if its humidity is too great. The Deutz Fahr {Tractor}has a horse power of 203 din, it has 8 wheels, weighs 11 tons and costs Â£50000. {Wheat}is sprayed twice a year, cost Â£40 an acre. The{Combine {Harvester} cost Â£48000, it holds 4 tons of grain before it needs to be emptied. It has its own straw chopper which spreads the straw.
